scripts.build: rm -rf packages/*/dist && npm run build:electron && npm run build:renderer
scripts.build:renderer: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=16384" NODE_ENV=production webpack build --config packages/renderer/webpack.config.js  --progress
scripts.compile: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --config .electron-builder.config.js
scripts.compile:win: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --config .electron-builder.config.js --win
